game.name: Robot Warriors
game.shortDescription: 이 해킹과 슬래시 게임에서 모두 슬래시와 슛을하십시오. 적을 많이 죽이고 임무를 완료하기 위해 출구로가는 길을 찾으십시오.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Slash and shoot everyone in your way in this hack and slash game. Kill a lot of enemies and find a way to the exit to complete missions.

reviewHighlights.text: Robot Warriors is an asset-flip of the Unity [url= https://forum.unity.com/threads/agk-action-game-kit-v1-5.202654/]AGK: Action Game Kit[/url] templat...
---{Graphics}--- ? You forget what reality is ? Beautiful ? Good ? Decent ? Bad X Don't look too long at it ? Paint.exe ---{Gameplay}--- ? Very good ?...
